TopicTitle: How to put a kerbal in an External Command Seat

Articles.Content: The title says it all. How to do this? And without spawning a commanded capsule on the back of your ship, EVAing the kerbal, and having him sit down. Is there any way to SPAWN like that?
Nope, no way to spawn a kerbal in a command seat. However: you can launch your command seat equipped thing on the launchpad (or runway depending) then launch a pod on the opposite thing.

When I was testing a rover with seats, I simply attached a command pod to a decoupler. EVA, board the rover, decouple the pod, and then "launch". If it's a rocket, you can always toss a separaton on it and send the pod safely away.
